abstract: The Deal Professor examines the state of play in Novartis‘s effort to squeeze out minority shareholders of Alcon now that it controls the eye care company.
snippet: The Deal Professor examines the state of play in Novartis‘s effort to squeeze out minority shareholders of Alcon now that it controls the eye care company.
lead_paragraph: 10:54 a.m. | Updated It is very likely that we are heading into the endgame in Novartis’s attempt to acquire the remaining 23 percent of the eye care company Alcon that Novartis, the big Swiss drug maker, does not already own. The tea leaves support such a conclusion.

headline.main: The Endgame for Alcon and Novartis
